options.help:
Automatically displays your most recent blog posts in chronological order. Perfect for:

  • Showing latest articles on your homepage
  • Keeping your content fresh and up-to-date
  • Creating dynamic content sections
  • Showcasing your recent writing

You can:

  • Set the number of posts to display
  • Add a custom headline and tagline to label the section
  • Trust the system to automatically keep your content current

The posts will automatically update as you publish new content, ensuring your pages always show your latest articles.
options.title: Posts Block
